content: अवया {c2c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To go down, to give way. {@--2@} To desist from, turn off or away. {@--3@} To know, understand; अथवा न धर्ममसुबोधसमयमवयात बालिशाः <ls>Śi. 15. 19.</ls>; न जनोऽयमित्यवयये स तापसैः <ls>Ki. 12. 15.</ls> {@--4@} To avert, prevent, remove.
अवया, --यात {%<ab>a.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> Giving way, desisting, ceasing; °हेळः <ab>Ved.</ab> one whose anger is appeased.
